brief_description: To comprehensively study the humoral response to immunization with rPA with or without Alum using in vitro antibody analyses and tissue staining.
brief_title: Comprehensive study of germinal center development and antibody response
condition_studied: effect of alum on the immune response to rPA
description: To comprehensively study the humoral response to immunization with rPA with or without Alum using in vitro antibody analyses and tissue staining.
endpoints: Mice were sacrificed at designated time points. ELISA and Immunohistochemistry assays were done on samples collected from the mice.
objectives: To comprehensively study the humoral response to immunization with rPA with or without Alum using in vitro antibody analyses and tissue staining.
official_title: Comprehensive study of germinal center development and antibody response

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with saline, bleed follow bleeding schedule A (days 2, 8, 15, 22, 29, 36, 50, 64, 79, 86), boost with rPA day 72, sacrifice at day 86
arm.name: Saline prime + rPA boost

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with saline, bleed follow bleeding schedule B (day 4, 11, 18, 25, 32, 43, 57, 71, 79, 86), boost with Saline on day 72, sacrifice at day 86
arm.name: Saline prime + Saline boost

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with saline, sacrifice at days 2,11, 15, 29, 36, 71 to collect tissues
arm.name: Saline prime + No boost

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with rPA 5ug, bleed follow bleeding schedule A (days 2, 8, 15, 22, 29, 36, 50, 64, 79, 86), boost with rPA day 72, sacrifice at day 86
arm.name: rPA prime + rPA  boost

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with rPA 5ug, bleed follow bleeding schedule B  (day 4, 11, 18, 25, 32, 43, 57, 71, 79, 86), boost with Saline day 72, sacrifice at day 86
arm.name: rPA prime + Saline boost

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with rPA 5ug, sacrifice at days 2,11, 15, 29, 36, 71 to collect tissues
arm.name: rPA prime + No boost

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with rPA 5ug and Alum 0.13ug, bleed follow bleeding schedule A  (days 2, 8, 15, 22, 29, 36, 50, 64, 79, 86), boost with rPA day 72, sacrifice at day 86
arm.name: rPA - Alum prime + rPA boost

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with rPA 5ug and Alum 0.13ug, bleed follow bleeding schedule B  (day 4, 11, 18, 25, 32, 43, 57, 71, 79, 86), boost with Saline day 72, sacrifice at day 86
arm.name: rPA - Alum prime + Saline boost

arm.description: mice were injected day 1 with rPA 5ug and Alum 0.13ug, sacrifice at days 2,11, 15, 29, 36, 71 to collect tissues
arm.name: rPA - Alum prime + No boost

program.contract_name: Multiscale Systems Immunology for Adjuvant Development
